experience.description: Conducted extensive primary and secondary research into retail sales methodologies and consumer psychology. Analyzed historical sales data to understand trends in seasonal purchasing behavior and the impact of product placement on conversion rates.

Evaluated the efficacy of various point-of-sale systems and inventory management strategies. Developed a theoretical framework for optimizing the customer journey within high-traffic retail environments, focusing on reducing friction during the checkout process.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
